name: Scratch Model Expansion v6
description: CTC-focused follow-ups around the strongest setting (word vocab + GRU), varying capacity, depth, and CTC weight.

experiments.name: V6-01: Word+GRU Larger + CTC 0.3
experiments.description: Best base (word+GRU) with larger dims plus CTC joint (ctc_weight=0.3).

experiments.name: V6-02: Word+GRU Larger + CTC 0.2
experiments.description: Same as V6-01 but lighter CTC weight (0.2) to test balance.

experiments.name: V6-03: Word+GRU Larger + CTC 0.4
experiments.description: Same as V6-01 but stronger CTC weight (0.4).

experiments.name: V6-04: Word+GRU Deeper + CTC
experiments.description: 4-layer pyramidal encoder, GRU decoder, with CTC (0.3).

experiments.name: V6-05: Word+GRU Larger + Low Dropout + CTC
experiments.description: Larger GRU model, lower dropout (0.1), with CTC (0.3).
